website_summaries.verdict: Impressive quality at any price point, but the low cost of this set is an appreciated bonus.
pros: The entire pan can be used in the oven (up to 500 degrees)
The set includes an excellent variety of different sizes
These pans are so non-stick, you can slide an egg out of the pan and onto your plate without using any utensils
We appreciated how lightweight and easy to store this set was
cons: There are no lids for the pans, and the lids from the pots do not fit the pans

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these pots and pans for little over a month, pretty much on a daily basis. They are truly non stick, super easy to clean and light weight. Also, these are great on my electric glass top range -- food cooks evenly because the pan has flat bottom. Overall, it is great value for the money paid. I wish I had known about this brand long ago!
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised. Light yet robust. Oven ready up to 500 degrees. And dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: The different sizes make cooking smaller portions easy, as the two larger pots for larger portions. Although not concerned about cooking without oil or butter, the surfaces are slick and as far as I can tell not easy to burn the contents -- not recommended to test that feature. The lids indeed do not exactly fit on the pans, but within. Not to mention I have many lids left over from pots and pans that are no longer in good condition. I'll be looking for more sizes. They nest nicely. and they are LIGHT. The price is right. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmine P.

customer_reviews.title: THE PRICE IS RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cook I've ever had . The largest lot ,I made some necklines. Those were the best I've tasted. I highly recommend this cook. BECAUSE if you can't, some how your food will come out tasting so. This work for anyone. AND YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE. LIKE BOB BARKER USE TO SAY (THE PRICE IS RIGHT)THANK YOU ,AND MAY KEEP ON BLESSING YOU ALLLLLLL
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa N.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This cookware looks beautiful and is very easy to clean. We do not put them in the dishwasher and cleaning them by hand takes only seconds. We even bought another set as a Christmas gift for a relative. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: The Clarks

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it’s a new item for me in my new house that God will give me soon! Amen
customer_reviews.author: king savageE

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Cookware Set! Beautiful cookware set, with vibrant colors. I use the pans everyday and haven't had any issues. The only downside to this set is the fact that there are no lids for the pans, but that seems to be a pretty common problem with a lot of sets. I just purchased a universal pot/pan lid so I had something to cover my pans while cooking, which works fantastic with the set. Honestly, I bought this set for the colors, and the colors have not faded. I've never put them in the dishwasher though, I always let them sit until the pan is cool to the touch, then rinse them off if I'm not ready to wash yet.
customer_reviews.author: XIAORAN REN

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for over 3 months now and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cookware.
customer_reviews.text: I need to upgrade my old cookware set. I did a lot of research and read ton of reviews before deciding to buy this set. I’m so happy I found this set. There are very true to their non stick description. I have done fried egg, fried paninis, onions and boiled pasta. Everything come out great, the small frypan in my favorite and I use it the most. I’ve been using them pretty much every day. I have not had single problem with them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: BEST pots and pans to invest ur money in
customer_reviews.text: LOVE EVERYTHING about these pots and pans, they are not scratch resistant. In fact the directions tell u Not to use Any type of metal in them or even stack other metal pots on them cuz they Will scratch them and then they are basically no good. But they cook Beautifully, u dont need oil or butter for anything!!
customer_reviews.author: sjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pan set!
customer_reviews.text: I've had them and used them heavily for several months now. No issues, the no stick surface is holding up perfect. I use them on a burner stove, heat is even and quick. They are heavy grade but not too heavy. I'd definitely recommend. The only drawback would be to have the set include one more larger pan for big meals.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Prior

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set daily for several weeks. Nice weight, great non-stick, pleasantly shaped. Fit and finish is excellent. Lids fit perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lesnick

customer_reviews.title: Quality product !
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this set at this price , but , this cookware is awesome, nothing really sticks , even when not using any oil or butter , amazing ! Well worth the money ! Very easy to clean , heats evenly , has not warped after 2 weeks of daily use ! Thanks for a great product , my wife loves them !
customer_reviews.author: george prickett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookware set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of nonstick cookware! No oil needed, cleans easily, high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: Standing up well
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pots for over two months now, and use them constantly. So far, so good, absolutely no complaints and they still look brand new. I am careful, though, not to use metal utensils anywhere near them and was them carefully, but everything, even burnt on food, slides right off with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G.

customer_reviews.title: is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: wow they are really good these picture is after I burn my food nonstick easy to clean up i added more pictures after trying frying my pancakes without oil 😍
customer_reviews.author: William Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Induction
customer_reviews.text: not the best for induction, but product works on everything else and customer service is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for myself and now this set witll be a Christmas gift. Great price and quality and goes into the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: TERRY LEE DOWLING

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and work well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my small Nuwave cook top. They are perfect and very attractive. I have tried the medium sized pot in the oven and it was perfect. They have more of a ceramic type interior finish. Not like the old cookware that would peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed... within a few uses lost the non- stick... became stained and unable to clean off discoloration. Also the “ copper” on the outside of frying pan disappeared showing white metal of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Good product. The color is very pretty in appearance. Overall I really like this product. I will buy one for my friends later. And I can cook a wonderful dinner for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Yulya

customer_reviews.title: Hot Handles
customer_reviews.text: Pro: ergo handle, Con: handle gets too hot to touch without pot holder on stove top. Would not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: excellent cookware
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware set, easy to use, care for and all of the pieces I need! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JHC

customer_reviews.title: Treat them nice & they should last a long time-read user guide-they’re great!
customer_reviews.text: If you use as directed, they are fabulous! DO NOT USE SPRAY OILS OR METAL UTENSILS ON THEM. I hand wash them every time- It’s so worth the extra couple minutes, washes extremely easy. You spend money on nice pots & pans, treat them nice, and they should last a very long time. I’ve had mine a couple months, and love them, but if anything changes I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these pots and pans, unfortunately, they are the worst! I followed the directions to clean them, no soap, extreme measures at home not to touch them, just by me, and guess what? I made a fried egg, I used oil, the egg completely got stuck on the pan...There is no way to clean it. So, I grabbed another pot, and I had the same result if not worse!! I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time and money the pans work for the first couple of weeks then everything sticks on . You can’t even make an egg on them. I had to throw them away. Could not return them on time and not worth wasting my time.
customer_reviews.author: brenda b lopez

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the skillets are no longer non-stick. Even sausage and hamburgers (?!) are sticking. So far, the pots seem to be holding up better, but hubby uses one or the other of the skillets almost every morning. Only plastic/silicone utensils are used. There are no scratches or chips visible in the bottom of the skillets. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, non-toxic, great value for kitchen ware set
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it’s not toxic and a good value for your money. It is very easy to clean we just use a sponge as the manufacturer suggests. The reason I read this at four not five is because the underside does get discolored very quickly with high heat, but this does not really bother me because what I care about most is how well it cooks my food. If you want a good value and non-toxic kitchenware this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jbjung719

customer_reviews.title: I hate this cookware
customer_reviews.text: For cooking dinner, i don't like the texture of my food after my meal was done. It took a while after i purchased the cookware for me to try the new set. And boy do i regret trashing my old cookware. Then long time for me to find where I purchased. Now i will see about a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J j

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it's very strange that it shows up in a generic box and the brand name is nowhere to be found which seems shady to me. However, the cookware itself is great. It is easy to clean, nothing at all ever even comes close to sticking to it, and it's very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These had great reviews for the price, but after 3 months of use I literally need a new set of pans. They're horrible, don't last and are really hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Claire F.

customer_reviews.title: 🥰🥰
customer_reviews.text: These distribute heat evenly, clean up nicely, and work great for things like hashbrowns, non-stick cook I love , they are light and cook even. No need for oils or butter. It is just awesome. I have been able to now teach my husband how to cook. Which he is pretty good at. I may have created a monster. The only thing I can say is you just have to try them. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lolo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pans!
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I always read the reviews before buying. Since the good outweighed the bad, I decided to give these pans a try. I am so happy I did. I have used them everyday since buying and am in love. I have a gas stove so I researched what type of pans work best and these were one of them. The directions recommended using them at Medium to medium high heat as a max and they heat up extremely quickly. They are also so easy to clean. The food slides out of the pans. I will purchase more of these pans when possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Bad decision
customer_reviews.text: The entire idea behind purchasing these pans was that they wouldn’t stick and would be easy to clean. Also they would be scratch resistant. They are none of these. I would never invest in these again. Scrambled eggs are a mess to clean and the outside of the pans are terrible
customer_reviews.author: Rickiecoombs

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These pans are cute, but dont hold up too well. I noticed scratches early on, and water gets trapped in the handles and can burn the crap out of you if you pick it up off the stove. Good for a new apartment, but if you want longevity I think you'd need to spend more to get a better quality set
customer_reviews.author: KMorris

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to work for induction and doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Only the large skillet and pot worked for my induction. The other the burners just shut off after making the telltale ticking noise that something isn’t right. What gives? Are the small ones a different material?
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Wade

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to replace our old set. They look nice and I like they can be used in the oven or on the stove. The non-stick surface works great and they are super easy to clean. They do scratch easier than I'd like, but I guess that comes with any type of pan.
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product, Awful Seller
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these pots/pans 10 months ago. When washing them, water gets in between the layers of the pans and then when we cook it makes a funny popping noise and doesn't heat well. We exchanged more than 20 messages with the seller and the seller came up with every excuse not to fulfill their one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these for me for Christmas. I have used them diligently for the past two months with great pride! The nonstick aspect is still as good as the day I pulled them out and I’m still in love with them! My only minor complaint is... they do get water in the handles that seeps out and drops on the burner while cooking, but that is not a dealbreaker to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact of using less oil to sauté or fry and a big plus is let pan cool then wipe out with paper towels. Then wash with a small amount of dish soap and water. Love that the handles do not heat up. Like the sizes because I have another set for larger cooking amounts. Still think the larger pot would be applicable for anyone unless feeding 8 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me for Christmas and I LOVE them. They are a great size and quality for my kitchen. Not only that, but they are easy to clean. I haven't braved dishwashing them (and probably never will) but with the copper non-stick, they only take a minute to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Deines

customer_reviews.title: Overall- Good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few months and I don’t cook every single day but they have help up well! I don’t know if they’re truly nonstick, I always add cooking spray. Good quality for the cost and stylish looking. If you life them in the dishwasher the lid will have a trail of rust on the lid from the vent hole. Other than that they’re very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great pots!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and I love it! They are so easy to clean and cook in. I love the steam vent in the lids. No more boiled over sticky messes from rice or pasta! They are so pretty that I hung them on a pot rack in my kitchen. A little tip: if the bottom of your pots become dull or tarnished a Mr. clean Magic eraser will help shine up the silver on the bottom. Please do not use Mr. clean eraser inside the pot, just on the bottom of part where it touches your stove :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eansley

customer_reviews.title: Great Pans!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans. I am hard on everything in the kitchen and terrible at burning things in pans and everything has came off this pots event when I burnt cheese in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to shape of handle
customer_reviews.text: We prefer a handle that is easier to grip. These are flat and didn't feel very secure in our hands. Pan's construction looked solid, great color, but we returned prior to using the set.
customer_reviews.author: pairofducks

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our travel trailer and they are awesome. I have deliberately melted cheese in these pans, let them cool down then took a paper towel and wiped the cheese out. I’ve also fried eggs with no grease and they do not stick. My fear is my wife will use to much soap when washing them! Lol we all know too much soap in a pan is not good. City girls!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pans, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to order pans for an induction cooktop. Because not all of the pans worked with what I have, the company refunded my total purchase price. Great experience of someone standing by a good product, even though it just didn't work for me! Would buy from them again, for sure. 5 stars on their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but....
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and cooked with them They seem to be good quality but they have a significant issue...; the first 3 in of the pot handles get very hot; if your hand gets closer than 3 inches to the pot you will burn yourself. even the handles for the lids get hot. Having said that there is enough room left on the handle to grab and move the pots around. I wish they had engineered better heat insulation for the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Start off good but the good didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Really loved these ar first but now just a couple months later food is sticking to the frying pans. Have not used cooking sprays. I have washed in dishwasher. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Davis

customer_reviews.title: I PAID TOO MUCH here on AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: The week after I purchased these pots, I found them on GROUPON for 50% Less than I paid here!!! The pots are very nice and we like them. Too bad we didn't get the better price.
customer_reviews.author: Winner

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Pots & Pans set
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these pots & pans set! I love how quality and durable they feel when I use them. I love that they are all matching and that they are non-stick. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Urdang

customer_reviews.title: Good but wears off quickly
customer_reviews.text: First impression: Absolutely loved this. Now: My family has been using this for a while. The rim gets a bit rusty after few washes.
customer_reviews.author: ASP

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for a month, I bought a silicone kitchen utensils set to keep it the best I could, i wash it very carefully with special sponges and The non stick is already damage, I wanted to cook fried eggs, and even with added oil it got sticked, look for another set becasue this one just don't worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The metal is real thin on the bottom of the pans. Plus the handles get hot and you can't hold them. I would like to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The pots/pans came exactly as pictured quick. Extremely non stick and seems to heat very evenly. The only issues we have come across is that the handles get hot. I noticed there are covers for the handles, but they attract heat very quickly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star!
customer_reviews.text: One of the pans arrived with the inner coating peeling/bubbled around the inner edge and with the finish messed up on the bottom. unfortunately, there isn’t an option to just send the one pan back to be exchanged. Instead, you have to send all of the pans back and keeping them seems easier than trying to repackage them in the same Tetris style maze they came in. Repacking the 10 pcs into the tiny box they came in will take more time than its worth. I am very disappointed that there isn’t a way to exchange only the damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: callie hall

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware! So easy to clean!! Nothing so far sticks to these pans! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy
customer_reviews.text: Listen these are a must buy!!!! So easy to clean and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Ash S

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: They look just okay. Doesn't look amazing honestly but does the job. They are easy to clean, will see if any chipping etc into the future.. Def good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: deniz isler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Is great, I bought to my mom for her birthday and she was really happy and she has an induction stove
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as my wife wanted.
customer_reviews.text: They seemed fine for me. The kids are out on their own so it is just two of us. They arrived undamaged and lids fit wit vent holes. They look great and I would have kept them. Happy Wife-Happy Life!
customer_reviews.author: Batdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: As far as durability goes, using the wrong utensils just once on these things can damage the lining on these pots and pans. Other than that, insanely easy to clean even after stuff is burned on. Im a fan for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Witchell

customer_reviews.title: Does it work on an induction stove top?
customer_reviews.text: The worst part is that I bought this for my electric stove top and I have a 50/50 chance of the stove top recognizing the pan. In other words I have a 50% chance of being able to use the pan at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small set
customer_reviews.text: Good looking.sensitive,not that strong or sturdy.leave scratch easily.I have to use it carefully.overall not bad with this price :|
customer_reviews.author: Mahbuba

customer_reviews.title: Good cooking utensil for cooking
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product. I like it because they are easy to clean and looks like durable product
customer_reviews.author: Fadejimi Adelakun

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Very pretty. Properly cared for, they should last a good long time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick on this great, probably the best I've used. But I've only had them a week so time will tell how good it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pots and pans, beautiful too!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the cookware set I got for my husband for Christmas. We love the look, the lids and easy cleaning. remember though that the pans should never be put in the dishwasher! Hand wash and dry after each use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gliptis

customer_reviews.title: Very good pots for your money
customer_reviews.text: I made another post because I purchased 2 sets the first set been i used but it was resolved the second set is nice and if you use the plastic spoons made for pots it will last long time very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: joshonda lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware I have had
customer_reviews.text: nothing sticks, however gave this a bad review, I don't know how they are cooking, but this pans work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel torres

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with sticking. Easy to clean and cooks evenly on my induction stove. Color is a bonus as it goes well with my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best set of pots and pans i have ever owned. They clean up easy and are sturdy. They also look quite nice and are a great addition to my new home. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: dadwithtwokids

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Food product but is already showing ware after 2 month
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: cookware
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cookware and love it! Although I did not get a lid for either of the skillets. Also are these oven safe-because I didn't get any paperwork with them and I don't want to ruin them. They are beautiful. And delivered right on time!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cookware set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy cookware set. I love the color and it is heavyweight without being too heavy. Cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mayhan

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Had them for 3 months now and still holding up perfectly. Don’t seem the most durable but for the price, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: jenny lee

customer_reviews.title: Find out how to care for this product because I can't seem to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: I would make a lower star review but I'm sure is partly my fault for not seasoning the metal correctly. Seems I need to scrub off these pans after nearly every use after the initial seasoning were offm
customer_reviews.author: David Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Never use high heat and don’t put hot pan to clean wait to cool
customer_reviews.text: Just revived the set a few days ago and I have used it every day and I love how they preform. Still have not been able to dear as yet.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Frying pans are not flat and foods items stick to bottom
customer_reviews.text: This set of pans seems like a good deal for the money but after using them for a few months I am very dissatisfied. The frying pans do not have a flat even cooking surface and items like eggs meat etc., stick to the bottom of the pan when cooking. Would not recommend this product to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Buy these pans! You will be happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are the best. They cook fast and well, and they are so easy to clean. Don't use metal utensils becuse it could scratch them.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer5000

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use silicone cooking utensils to preserve the pans. Works great
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This set is such a good buy. The coating is very very smooth and consistent. Nothing sticks to it. Easy to clean inside and out and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ChimpyJon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set; easy to clean and NOTHING sticks!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter for law school she’s very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for law school she’s very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Induction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because it is advertised that they work on induction stovetops. THEY DO NOT WORK. I had to return them because they don't work on my stove. The item description should be changed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, I’m not satisfy at all, I used two of them only twice, and nonstick coating start coming out.
customer_reviews.author: jaytu

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cookware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The minute I took them out of the box I was so excited!!
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my son and wife, they love it, nice and well built
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After 10 meals bottom is starting to darken but overall very good. I am using less oil to cook now. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Clean up is so easy and cooking in these pans is a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Missing pot
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looked really nice however the box came with missing pieces. Kind of ridiculous!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and look fansy.
customer_reviews.text: Good birthday gift for mom so she will make more delicious food every. Those non-stick cookwares look fansy and very easy to clean even oil. Nice choice you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t lol the fact that cookware is coming off. And i no that not a good thing because you are eating that I need for it to be replaced. No happy at this time
customer_reviews.author: Debra Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great pans but
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed most of my pans from this seller except the largest one which has been damaged from regular use After following the directions that came with the set. All of the other pans have worked well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, you'll want to display
customer_reviews.text: A great set for the money. I've only had a couple of weeks but happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: AWILK

customer_reviews.title: Handle leak water
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend. I bought these for my first apartment. After using them I noticed if I boiled water, water would start to leak from the handle. This happened on all the pans not just one
customer_reviews.author: Drew Rademacher

customer_reviews.title: Still nonstick after almost a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for almost a year now and they still look great. Easy to clean either by hand or thru the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!))
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, really easy to clean. Nothing is burnt. And looks great. I was really amazed when I saw it first time. And now when I use it I’m satisfied. Recomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav Pereverziev

customer_reviews.title: Non Stick at it's best
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware set, usually I am known for burning pans and having food stuck to them, however this copper non stick pans truly work. Great value for the money. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: The Boss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner and was easy to clean when used as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Other than a few tinny patchy spots on of the pots, this is a beautiful set!
customer_reviews.author: Maysun

product_meta.title: Nonstick Cookware Set, CUSINAID 10-Piece Aluminum Cookware Sets Pots and Pans Set, Fry Pan, Sauce Pan, Stock Pot with Glass Lids for Stovetops/Induction Cooktops, Dishwasher/Oven Safe(Copper)
feature_bullets: 10-Piece Non-Stick Cookware Set for Multi-Purpose Use: Include 2 covered saucepans (1.5qt/2qt), 2 covered stockpots (2.5qt/4qt), and 2 open fry pans(8in/10.5in), meeting all cooking methods and daily cooking use

Pans & Pots with Ceramic Coating, PTFE/PFOA/LEAD/CADMIUM-FREE: Easily cook without oil, prepare healthy meals for your family and clean conveniently; oven safe to 500℉(glass lid oven safe to 390℉) and dishwasher safe

Double-Bottom Aluminum Cookware : The impact-bonded stainless steel bases & aluminum construction makes food evenly and fast heating, compatible with oven, gas, electric, ceramic, glass, stovetops and induction cooktops, etc
Anti Warping Cookware Set with 18/10 Stainless Steel Handles: Light & durable hard anodized aluminum cookware fights corrosion, warping and rust to ensure healthy food and long-term use
RUSTIC COLORS AND MODERN DESIGN: Cusinaid Cookware features rustic colors and modern design that fuses relaxed style and everyday functionality
